More about the area and MAP Hillsboro Answering Services

Hillsboro, located in Washington County, is the fifth-largest city in Oregon. It is in the Tualatin Valley on the west side of the Portland metro area. The city is home to many technology companies such as Intel. In addition to the high-tech industry, others include: healthcare, retail sales, and agriculture. The city has more than twenty parks as well as nine sites listed on the National Register of Historic Places. Hillsboro is also home to Pacific University’s Health Professions Campus. Many businesses like these and other local businesses require the use of a high quality Hillsboro call center service.
